Name: Battle Imagine - Storm Goblin Warrior
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Storm Goblin Warrior's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Whirlwind Strike.

Stunt! Whirlwind Strike
Summon Elite: Storm Goblin Warrior to continuously release Whirlwind Slash, dealing Attack Damage and pulling in all surrounding units.
Upon the skill cast, your Wind Bonus is increased for a period.
Description$english:
Use to activate or upgrade Storm Goblin Warrior's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Whirlwind Strike.

Stunt! Whirlwind Strike

Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
